    • Constructor Detail

      • DtpFactory

        public DtpFactory(AbstractCommunicationFactory<?,?,?,?> comFactory,
                  java.lang.Class<H> handlerClass)
        Parameters:
        comFactory - settings to apply at communication session
        handlerClass - class to handle the communication

      • DtpFactory

        public DtpFactory(AbstractCommunicationFactory<?,?,?,?> comFactory,
                  java.lang.Class<H> handlerClass,
                  int maxHandlerThreads,
                  int maxListenersPerBindAddr,
                  int maxListenerThreads)
        Parameters:
        comFactory - settings to apply at communication session
        handlerClass - class to handle the communication
        maxHandlerThreads - maximum number of threads in parallel process to respond at handler
        maxListenersPerBindAddr - maximum number of listener ports opened per bind address to receive raw data
        maxListenerThreads - maximum number of threads in parallel process to process raw data

      • serverInstanciation

        public final DtpServer serverInstanciation()
                                    throws ConnectionLtException
        Returns:
        new server instance
        Throws:
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection of the server, that exception should be put in the cause of the ConnectionLtException

      • serverInstanciation

        public DtpServer serverInstanciation(int port,
                                     int backlog,
                                     java.net.InetAddress bindAddr)
                              throws ConnectionLtException
        Parameters:
        port - the local TCP port
        backlog - the listen backlog
        bindAddr - the local InetAddress the server will bind to
        Returns:
        new server instance
        Throws:
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection of the server, that exception should be put in the cause of the ConnectionLtException

      • clientInstanciation

        public final DtpClient clientInstanciation(java.lang.String host)
                                    throws ConnectionLtException,
                                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                           java.lang.SecurityException
        Parameters:
        host - the Host name
        Returns:
        new client instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the hostname parameter is null.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if a security manager is present and permission to resolve the host name is denied.
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection of the client, that exception should be in the cause of the ConnectionLtException

      • clientInstanciation

        public final DtpClient clientInstanciation(java.lang.String host,
                                           int port)
                                    throws ConnectionLtException,
                                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                           java.lang.SecurityException
        Parameters:
        host - the Host name
        port - the port number
        Returns:
        new client instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the port parameter is outside the range of valid port values, or if the hostname parameter is null.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if a security manager is present and permission to resolve the host name is denied.
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection of the client, that exception should be in the cause of the ConnectionLtException

      • clientInstanciation

                                    throws ConnectionLtException
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        new client instance
        Throws:

                                     java.lang.String charsetName)
                              throws ConnectionLtException
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the SocketAddress
        charsetName - the name of a supported charset
        Returns:
        new client instance
        Throws:
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection of the client, that exception should be in the cause of the ConnectionLtException
